In 1987, he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.
sentences.translation: 1987年他被正式授予‘摇滚名人堂’的奖项。

sentences.sentence: Robinson was inducted into the Baseball Hall of Fame in 1962, his first year of eligibility.
sentences.translation: 1962年，罗宾森被引荐进棒球名人堂，并于同年首次获得票选资格。
